original_text: The Jews gathered themselves together in their cities throughout all the provinces of the king Ahasuerus, to lay hand on such as sought their hurt: and no man could withstand them; for the fear of them fell upon all people.
korean_text: 유다인들이 아하수에로 왕의 각 지방, 각 읍에 모여 자기들을 해하고자 한 자를 죽이려 하니 모든 민족이 그들을 두려워하여 능히 막을 자가 없고

sentences.original_text: The Jews gathered themselves together in their cities
throughout all the provinces of the king Ahasuerus
to lay hand on such as sought their hurt
sentences.korean_translation: 자신들을 해치려는 자들에게 손을 얹으려 하였으나

sentences.original_text: and no man could withstand them
for the fear of them fell upon all people
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들의 두려움이 모든 백성에게 떨어졌기 때문이었다
